title: Kourtney Kardashian's Youngest Son Goes Viral After Flipping Off Photographers
text:
Reign Disick just became the coolest KarJenner crew member after he flipped photographers the bird in Armenia.

It all went down on Wednesday when Kourtney Kardashian's four-year-old son was exiting a restaurant with his famous family as mounds of shutterbugs flashed away.

Related:

Kourtney Kardashian As a Blonde Is a Very New Thing

Kourtney Kardashian's Childrens' Playhouse Is Nicer Than Your Actual Home

Kourtney Kardashian Reunites With Ex Younes Bendjima for Birthday Celebration

Kourtney Kardashian Roasted For Touting Feminine Wash Without Using The Word Vagina

Kourtney Kardashian Praised For Not Editing Stretch Marks, Was It an Accident?

In a video captured by a "KUWTK" fan, Cutie Kardashians, we see Reign's older brother Mason Disick leave lunch first with a handler and head into the waiting SUV.

Then comes Kim and Kanye's kids, North and Saint, followed by Kourtney and her daughter, Penelope.

Reign's at the end being carried out by a Kendall Jenner look-alike and sticks up his middle finger while smirking, a move his famous model aunt does all the time.

Fans Are ROLLING

After this video made the rounds, Reign instantly became an Internet sensation!

Fans took to social media and have been posting the most hilarious memes of Kourtney and Scott Disick's youngest son.

Poosh Has Something To Say!

Some are even making light of a recent episode where Scott and Corey Gamble got into a heated argument.

Everyone Loves Reign!

Even non-Kardashian fans are giving the tiny tyke props!

Who Needs 'Em?

He's clearly the favorite among the KarJenner's fan club.

Move over family, it's Reign's time right now!

When his aunt Khloé Kardashian told fans to vote for her as TV's favorite reality star for People's Choice, a fan responded, "Everyone vote for Reign Disick."

Runs in The Family!

View photos

Reign must have learned the bird from his famous family.

Kendall, Kylie, Khloé, Kim, Kourtney and even grandma Kris have posed while flipping off the camera.

We have receipts, ladies!
description: Reign Disick just became the coolest KarJenner crew member.
